# bash
## change directories easily
```bash
alias ..='cd ..'
```
```bash
alias ...='cd ../..'
```
```bash
alias ....='cd ../../..'
```
```bash
alias .....='cd ../../../..'
```
## ls
```bash
alias l='ls -lah'
```
## npm install
```bash
alias npi='npm install'
```
```bash
alias npis='npm install --save'
```
```bash
alias npig='npm install -g'
```
## npm update
```bash
alias npu='npm update'
```
```bash
alias npug='npm update -g'
```
